data: Somasco ranch | Cayuse pony | British Columbian settlement
It was snowing slowly and persistently, as it had done all day, when Henry Alton of Somasco ranch stood struggling with a half-tamed Cayuse pony in a British Columbian settlement.
Alton of Somasco: A Romance of the Great Northwest
